text: Omo yo, watashi wa shison no aru mono o anata no seinaru yakata no soba no tagayasenai tanima ni sumawasemashita. Omo yo, kare-ra ni reihai no tsutome o mamora sete kudasai. SÅ sureba hitobito no kokoro o kare-ra ni hikitsukerudeshou. Mata kare-ra ni kajitsu o o sazuke kudasai. Kitto kare-ra wa kansha surudeshou
